grails.mongodb.geo
[Groovy] Class Polygon

java.lang.Object
  grails.mongodb.geo.Shape
      grails.mongodb.geo.Polygon
All Implemented Interfaces:
GeoJSON
@groovy.transform.CompileStatic
@groovy.transform.EqualsAndHashCode
class Polygon
extends Shape

Represents a GeoJSON polygon for use in Geo data models. See http://geojson.org/geojson-spec.html#polygon

Property Summary
java.util.List points

The Point instances that constitute the Polygon
 
Constructor Summary
Polygon(Point x, Point y, Point z, Point... others)

Constructs a Polygon for the given Point instances
 
Method Summary
java.util.List asList()

Converts the Polygon to a multi-dimensional list of coordinates.

java.lang.String toString()

static Polygon valueOf(java.util.List coords)

The inverse of Polygon#asList()#asList(), constructs a Polygon from a coordinate list

Polygon

Polygon(Point x, Point y, Point z, Point... others)

Parameters:

y - The y Point
z - The z Point
others - The remaining Point instances

 
Method Detail

asList

java.util.List asList()
Converts the Polygon to a multi-dimensional list of coordinates. Example: [ [100.0, 0.0], [101.0, 0.0], [101.0, 1.0], [100.0, 1.0], [100.0, 0.0] ]
Returns:
The list
